mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOCABULARY(vocano, voca, mean, managerno) VALUES(voca_seq.nextval, #{voca}, #{mean}, #{managerno})
mapper.select: SELECT vocano, voca, mean, managerno FROM vocabulary ORDER BY vocano

SELECT vocano, voca, mean, managerno
FROM vocabulary
WHERE vocano = #{vocano}
WHERE vocano = #{vocano} AND (UPPER(voca) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(mean) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY vocano DESC
